text: Nǐ dāng duì tāmen xuāndú nǔ hā de gùshì, dāngshí tā duì tā de zōngzú shuō:`Wǒ de zōngzú a! Rúguǒ wǒ jūzhù zài nǐmen zhōngjiān, yǐ zhēnzhǔ de jīxiàng jiàoxùn nǐmen, zhè shǐ nǐmen gǎndào nánkān, nàmò, wǒ zhǐ xìntuō zhēnzhǔ, nǐmen yīngdāng hé nǐmen de pèi zhǔ zài yīqǐ juédìng nǐmen de shìqíng, bùyào ràng nǐmen de shìqíng chéngwéi nuǎn mèi de. Nǐmen duì wǒ zuò chū pànjué ba, bùyào kuānxiàn wǒ.
